name: La Marina Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: 246/2B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Mũi Né, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc tại vị trí trung tâm ở Làng Mũi Né, La Marina Hotel cung cấp các phòng máy lạnh đi kèm Wi-Fi miễn phí, hầu hết đều cho tầm nhìn ra quang cảnh biển. Chỉ cách Bãi Rạng 50 m, khách sạn này còn có sân hiên phơi nắng rộng rãi và lễ tân 24 giờ.

Tất cả các phòng nghỉ tại đây đều được trang bị máy lạnh, TV màn hình phẳng và minibar. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm vòi sen.

La Marina Hotel cách chợ làng 150 m và cách khu sinh hoạt cộng đồng Đông Vui nổi tiếng với các quầy hàng địa phương của Việt Nam 1 phút đi bộ. Nơi nghỉ này
cách Đồi Cát 5 km, cách Thành phố Phan Thiết và Ga Phan Thiết 15 km.

Khách sạn cung cấp dịch vụ giặt là, tour du lịch bằng xe jeep và dịch vụ cho thuê xe đạp.

Một loạt các món ăn Phương Tây và Việt Nam được phục vụ từ 07:00 - 17:00 trong khuôn viên. Khách sạn cũng chỉ cách khu ẩm thực Đông Vui nổi tiếng một quãng tản bộ ngắn.

review.rating: The NICEST Staff EVER & A Lovely Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The staff here, wow. They're the cutest, loveliest people ever. We unfortunately were in a bus fire on the way to this hotel, which meant we lost all of our things. The two sisters that work here were went above and beyond to help us, they constantly asked if we were ok, and have asked that we keep them updated on our travels to make sure we are ok. I can't believe how nice they have been, it's honestly amazing. Thank you, it hasn't gone unnoticed! They also arranged a bike rental for us and helped us organise a taxi for our onwards journey.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, we have had the best stay!

I tried to rent a motorbike one evening and a man at the desk told me to come back in the morning. I said I wanted to leave at 6 am and he confirmed several times that there would be someone there to rent me the bike. When i came down in the morning no one was there. I rang the bell and nothing. Very frustrating. There is really nothing around here - no beach and not really any restaurants. You will have to rent a motorbike.  There is also no sun in the pool area, it is almost completely shaded the entire day.

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Stupendo hotel a pochi passi dal mare. Piscina pulita, stanza spaziosa e pulita al piano 4  con una stupenda vista sul mare. Colazione super eccezionale. Puoi scegliere una bibita tra cappuccio, the, smooties vari, praticamente qualsiasi bibita. Poi puoi scegliere un piatto salato tra una decina di opportunità co frittate, uova o anche cibi vietnamiti. Infine puoi scegliere un piatto dolce, tra cui varie crepes. Dopo una colazione simile, non mangerai fino a cena. La zona colazione di fianco alla piscina è  accogliente e molto caratteristica.
review.comment_negative: Non vi è spiaggia in zona. Non è colpa dell'hotel, ma per chi prenota da lontano non è facile capire il contesto. Per andare in una spiaggia dove prendere il sole magari con qualche ombrellone, bisogna prendere un taxi che in 5 min con 3 € circa ti porta di fronte all' Ocean Vista. Con pochi € affitti un ombrellone per tutto il giorno. Noi abbiamo pagato un tot di circa 8 € per un ombrellone con 4 sdraio.

review.rating: Laid Back Mui Ne / Great BoHo Hotel / Lovely Sunset Views
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Booked this late summer 2023 knowing we would be travelling down the Vietnam coast by train over the Christmas period. Although a little off the Reunification Railway path, this quieter resort seemed more preferable to Da Nang or Nha Trang. This laid back boho retreat didn't disappoint. A third floor seaview balcony greeted us. Simple breakfasts were added free of charge upon our check in, probably because of my Booking.com Genius rating. (Try the banana pancakes !) Beds were comfortable. A combo of oscillating fan and / or AC could be used to chill the rooms. The shower cubicle was the largest we've encountered in a month. All the usual toiletries are provided. The mini safe & laundry service very welcome. Several English language movie and news channels came free along with the occassional Premier League game. The pool was small and sheltered with foliage which suited us. Around the pool we saw, a frog, a lizzard, birds, butterflies etc.* In four weeks, this has been one of the few hotels where we couldn't hear the stealthy cleaning ladies. (They mostly shout along corridors elsewhere.) Here, we often found them standing quietly, ninja like, when we emerged for breakfast. As mentioned in other reviews, those suffering from noodle pho-tigue have a really good food court along the lane. (Roast Dinners / Burgers / Kebabs / Curries etc) along with a well stocked bar for craft beers and decent international wines. (Avoid Vietnamese Wine !!) The beachside promenade lead to several sunset type beach bars, many of which were frequented, (during Christmas week at least,) by ex-pats.
review.comment_negative:
Our room wifi seemed to drift in and out periodically. We found it very irritating that the password always needing to be re-entered virtually everytime, although strangely not in the restaurant area. Said restaurant delights in playing background music of the "no royalty" jazz swing cover variety. Expect to hear bizarre reworkings of Duran Duran, Coldplay and Limp Bizkit. Language can be an issue when ordering. I saw several older food court patrons, (mostly Russians,) venting their frustration towards tiny young Vietnamese servers. Please be patient folks. A bit of phrasebook lingo or Google translate goes a long way. 
Yes, the beach here is more of a breakwater for the fishermen rather than swimmers. 
It's Vietnam - You WILL see rats*. You WILL hear car horns and dogs barking. There WILL be ants and mozzies. The toilets and drains WILL burp up the occassional odour. 
My personal gripes : The whining children, pouting selfie takers, skunk smokers and people who shout into their phones too thick to understand how amplification works. Inconsiderate Muppets !

review.comment_positive:
J'habite au Vietnam depuis 15 ans et je vais souvent a MUI NE, j'ai decouvert La MARINA grace a Booking.com......
Les hotels a MUI NE sont soit chers et peu attractifs ou insignifiants.
La MARINA est un super etablissement avec un prix tres correct, chambre fabuleuse avec balcon et vue sur la mer 
La carte du restaurant est exeptionnelle pour un FRANCAIS. 
Petit dejeuner excellent avec des bons croissants, piscine tres agreable. 
Bref un etablissement parfait et peu cher !

review.rating: phù hợp cho ai cần nghĩ dưỡng
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
- Nơi ở thoải mái (phòng hướng biển thoáng mát), vừa gần biển (tối dọc biển có quán cà phê glamour xinh, nước ngon, giá rẻ), vừa gần ngoài đường (khu vực này bán quán ăn địa phương, vị ngon lạ, giá ok)
- Khách sạn có hồ bơi (view đẹp nhé), cà phê, nhà banh cho em bé
- Gần chợ Hàm Tiến, mua hải sản ở chợ tươi rẻ. Bếp khách sạn nhận chế biến 100k/kg, mình mua nhìu nên được giảm. Chế biến khẩu vị ok, phục vụ nhiệt tình, ngồi ăn view ngay hồ bơi xịn sò
- Nhân viên thân thiện (trừ bạn lễ tân ngày đầu mình nhận phòng)
review.comment_negative:
- nên lựa chọn đối tác cho thuê xe tốt hơn. cần thông báo chính xác khách nhận xe mấy giờ, trả xe mấy giờ. nếu quá giờ thì tính thế nào. mình lố 2h mà tính thành nửa ngày. mình ko chịu nên khách sạn làm việc lại bên đối tác xe máy mới tính lại 50k/2 xe
- bồn nước bị lỗi nên mình đang tắm 2 lần đều cúp nước
- nên xem lại việc để khăn lót sàn trong nhà tắm, ko hút nước lại ẩm ướt tràn nước

review.comment_positive: I absolutely love the interior design of the room, and how well-equipped and designed the room was. Everything was so convenient, while looking so nice! Absolutely loved the staff. It was beyond my expectations. There were many restaurants around, and beach bars. It was literally 2-minute walk away from an awesome beach. Highly recommend.

review.comment_positive: So với giá tiền thì chất lượng cũng bình thường. Phòng có ban công.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Sehr Kinderfreundlich, im angrenzenden Restaurant, wo Frühstück serviert wird, befinden sich ein Bällebad, Rutsche und Wippe. Wir haben lange nicht mehr so entspannt gefrühstückt. 
traumhafte Aussicht vom Balkon, hilfsbereites Personal und alles sehr sauber. Massage im Spa einfach super Qualität, v.a. preis-Leistung.
review.comment_negative: während unseres Aufenthalts wurde die Feuertreppe neu gebaut, war vor allem zum Mittagsschlaf sehr laut.

review.rating: Lovely room, comfy bed and great view!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The room is very spacious, the bed is huge and we got a balcony with sea view! Lovely!! 
Our room was on the second floor! 

The bathroom is big, but has a funny smell (like almost all hotels in Southeast Asia), the water pressure was good but the at the first night it didn’t heat enough. 

We had breakfast at the hotel restaurant once and it was good ( not included on our stay).

The pool looks clean, but we didn’t use it. 

Location wise, it’s very close to the beach and to a delicious food court, very handy!  If  you drive motorbike it’s easy to get around, otherwise you’ll have to rely on taxis and that can be a pain. 

Totally worth the price!
review.comment_negative: The staff is lovely but the reception a bit messy. We arrived after 8pm and the communication wasn’t good. the same happened when we wanted information about tours and motorbike. In the end everything worked fine, but you might need a bit of patience and use your Google translator.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
This little boutique hotel is amazing. Honestly a great place to stay, even if you’re sick! They took amazing care of me. I wouldn’t have wanted to have been anywhere else. They went out of their way to get me Pho delivered and made me lots of ginger tea. 

I always look for quiet places and this was a perfectly quiet hotel but right in the mix of it all. Restaurants are all with in walking distance. The beach is a block away! 
The brunch bar at the top of the alley was really good too. 

looking forward to my next stay here!
review.comment_negative: wifi was a little slow

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Hạng Bình Dân

La chambre est spacieuse et le lit très confortable.
Salle de bain impeccable aussi

review.comment_positive:
We had been travelling long distances by motorbike, so needed somewhere comfortable and affordable. This place was exactly that. Our room was very clean, big comfortable bed and space for all our stuff. Good size western style bathroom. 
Secure parking for motorbikes.
Efficient laundry service was useful. 
Just 1 minute away is an evening food court with plenty of options and a bar. Good coffee shop across the street. 
We had a very relaxing stay, excellent value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Hạng Bình Dân
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We booked a superior double room with breakfast. The room was lovely, bright, fresh and great decor. Well worth booking room with breakfast, as their breakfast really is outstanding for value and quality. 
The pool area is kept well and resturant is very inviting again, great decor and bright colours. It was very quiet on our visit, so it was hard to comment on the atmosphere and what it would be like if it were busier.
Staff very friendly and went extra Mike (was my birthday during the visit), helped with all our enquiries, booked a jeep tour through them, motorbike rental, onward bus journey, and did laundry there.
review.comment_negative:
There was a slight smell in the room, mainly coming from bathroom, sewerage  type smell. Didn't affect the visit. Part of the toilet was leaking, told reception, and this was rectified quickly. 

The town was very quiet, and the beach next to the hotel was full of rubbish and  sewerage (though we did see locals trying to clear up).
 However, there are nicer parts/ beaches nearer by just  to explore and go by bike.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Très bon hôtel. Personnel sympathique. Chambre propre et équipée. La piscine est un vrai plus pour se détendre.

review.comment_positive: Очень уютно и очень удобная большая кровать, симпатичный ресторан при отеле
review.comment_negative: Напротив отеля не пляж, а грязная мощеная набережная, нет парковки - машину пришлось парковать на узкой улице у отеля, в нашем номере не было горячей воды

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
가성비 갑!! 무이네 숙소는 무조건 여기로 잡으세요! 오션뷰라고 써있는데 100% 오션뷰는 처음인 거 같아요. 거기에 실외 수영장과 바로 옆 편의시설도 깔끔하고, 수영 전용 타월도 제공되요. 심지어 호텔에서 식당을 영업하는데 여기서 포함된 조식을 드시면 됩니다! 음식이 너무 맛있어서 무이네에 있는 다른 식당들을 갈 필요가 없었어요. 해변가도 매우 가깝습니다. 도보로 3~5분이에여! 

무이네 가시는 분들 여기 꼭 가세요! 벌레도 없고 세탁도 되고 좋아요.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We loved this place. It’s in the perfect location to stay few days in Mui Ne where there is no much to do a part from the dunes tour. It has a really good cafe for breakfast/brunch and behind the hotel there is a food court with many stalls to choose food from. The swimming area is really nice & relaxing. Also the massage I had at the hotel was great. Stay here if you want few relaxing day.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Если вы хотите релакса, то вам сюда. Тихо, спокойно, без навящевости. Убирали номер так, как нигде прежде. Чисто, не пылинки. А главное всегда незаметно от нас. Мы уходили, приходили и уже чисто.
Ресторан при отеле нет слов. Мало того, что классная игровая, так и персонал, запоминал наши предпочтения и всегда все чётко.

Colazione alla carta nel ristorante annesso e con ampia e valida scelta. Buoni i servizi con Soa ( massaggi) e noleggio scooter oltre che servizi a richiesta per organizzazione di transfert e tour.

Direi nulla! 
Unico neo è che la spiaggia annessa in  pratica è stata portata via dal mare, ma stanno costruendo un lungo mare che permetta almeno di passeggiare.

review.comment_positive:
Das Zimmer war groß und sehr komfortabel. Im Bad hatten wir genug Ablageplatz für unsere Kosmetiktaschen und beim Duschen ist auch nichts nass geworden. Das große Bett war sehr bequem! Wir waren leider nur eine Nacht hier, hätten aber auch noch länger bleiben können.
Das Personal am Empfang hilft gerne beim Buchen der Weiterreise oder anderen Angelegenheiten. Gepäck kann man am Abreisetag noch im Hotel lassen. Pool ist sauber, war uns aber ein bisschen zu kalt (wir waren abends im Pool, eventuell hat er durch die schon untergegangene Sonne ein bisschen abgekühlt gehabt). 
Es gibt viele Essensmöglichkeiten in der nahen Umgebung. Am Strand waren wir nicht, deshalb können wir dazu leider nichts sagen.
review.comment_negative: Service beim Frühstück konnte kein Englisch, daher gabs erstmal kurz Verwirrung, konnten wir aber schnell klären. Der Kaffee beim Frühstück hat uns leider nicht geschmeckt, da hatten wir in Vietnam definitiv viele Kaffees, die besser waren.

review.comment_positive:
Идеальный отель! Настолько идеальный, что мы продлили свой отдых тут. Очень уютные номера с удобными кроватями, отзывчивый персонал, вкусный и недорогой ресторан внизу, супер бассейн, где прохладная вода. Идеально все.

Отель расположен в тихом переулке, шума от главной улицы не слышно. Рядом нет пляжа, но есть множество бич-клабов где можно взять воду/кофе и сидеть хоть весь день на хороших лежаках. Очень советую этот отель, с выбором не ошибетесь!
review.comment_negative: Все идеально

Khách sạn decor phong cách mỹ thuật và văn học pha chút hương vị biển, nhiều tranh mỹ thuật khá ấn tượng .
Khách sạn ngay gần vị trí đánh bắt của người dân bãi dừa , nên xuống biển vào sáng sớm để xem cảnh người dân làng chài gỡ lưới và có thể mua hải sản tươi sống mặc dù không đa dạng hải sản . muốn đa dạng hơn thì cách chút có làng chài mũi né , nhưng ở đây có nhiều gian thương nên không khuyến khích 
Phòng view biển khá đẹp có thể ngắm hoàng hôn nhắm nháp ly trà quả là tuyệt vời .

Do phải đi vào hẻm nên di chuyển oto và đậu lại cũng hơi mắc công , nhưng vẫn ok . chỉ vào cuối tuần lễ tết chắc hơi căng .
Khu này bờ biển cũng k đẹp lắm mà vẫn đáp ứng được nhu cầu tắm biển và dạo biển .

review.comment_negative:
The “balcony” of our standard room was actually only a little space with a chair in the outdoor staircase… useless. 
Hot shower didn’t work at night for 2 days 
The common area around the pool and in the lobby is nice but swimming pool is always in the shadow so we couldn’t use it. 
Very long service (and not friendly) at the restaurant of the hotel

In general, we didn’t like Mui Ne, the “beach” that is close to the hotel is actually just a concrete pier along the sea, you’ll need a scooter to access a beach that is not that nice.

The pool was cute, like a small oasis and the Restaurant always a good choice for breakfast, a snack or even a dinner. The staff was superfriendly and helpful, Motorbike organizing, Taxi, ... and spoke a good english. Thank you so much, we really enjoyed this place.

review.rating: Top Preis-Leistung für einen Aufenthalt in Mui Ne
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Top Preis-Leistung! Wir haben zu zweit 30€/ Nacht bezahlt und dafür war es wirklich sehr gut. Beim Check-in haben wir ein kostenloses Upgrade bekommen für ein Zimmer mit Balkon und Meerblick, Zimmer war sehr ordentlich, groß und sauber. Klimaanlage, Fernseher etc. war alles vorhanden, gutes Wlan, frühstücken kann man kostenlos im Restaurant nebenan mit einer großen Auswahl, Poolbereich schön schattig und sauber, guter Roller konnte gemietet werden, Wäscheservice wurde angeboten
review.comment_negative: TV ist leider kein Smart-TV. Im Moment wird im Hotel eine Notausgangstreppe gebaut, weshalb es manchmal etwas lauter ist, hat uns aber absolut nicht gestört

review.comment_positive: The view was lovely and the breakfast was fantastic. The nearby food court is awesome - highly recommend! The staff were very friendly, and arranged a taxi for us which was reasonably priced and a great service.
review.comment_negative: The room was extremely hot, and you could not leave the aircon or fan running while not in the room so it was impossible to keep the room cool, as the AC was outdated and struggled. The bathroom was particularly hot, with no way of cooling. The sheets did not feel clean and had a musty scent (kinda smelt like sweat). The desk was also not staffed most of the time.  Also, be aware that dogs patrol the neighbourhood, they don't appear to be a problem but does make it difficult to walk around the neighbourhood.

review.comment_positive: Alles war herrlich, wir wären gerne länger geblieben.  Die Mädchen am Empfang sind wirklich nett und hilfsbereit, aber aus echter Freundlichkeit, nicht aus geschäftlichen Gründen. Der Poolbereich ein zauberhaft tropischer Garten und die Zimmer vollkommen eingerichtet, man fühlt sich geborgen wie daheim. Die mit riesigen Palmen durchzogene nahe Strandpromenade sehr angenehm mit vielen Bars und Restaurants, gross und ein wahrer Genuss den Abend zu verbringen. Zur linken Seite ein langer weißer Sandstrand, ideal für längere Spaziergänge, wer mutig ist kann bei Ebbe bis zum Fischerhafen wandern, ein erstaunenswertes Erlebnis. Für uns war das Marinahotel der schönste Platz von Vietnam und wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen, schon wegen der freundlichen und liebenswerten Menschen. Danke Tran und Jessica

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel hat einen schönen maritimen Stil, ohne künstlich zu wirken. Das Restaurant und das Frühstück sind lecker und dabei preiswert. Sehr zu empfehlen sind die poschierten Eier mit Bacon und dazu einen starken vietn. Kaffee.
Das Personal ist insg. freundlich, obwohl leichte kommunikationsschwierigkeiten auf englisch bestehen. Die Rezeptionistin hat und sehr bei der Weiterreise zum Bahnhof nach Phan Thiet geholfen.
Das Hotel ist gut gelegen, 2 Min. zum "Strand" bzw. Zum Meer (Achtung viel Müll!) - Leider kein Liegestrand.
Man kann sich Roller im Hotel ausleihen um bspw. den nahgelegenen Red Canyon (10 min.) zu besichtigen oder die schöne Küstenstrasse abzufahren zur roten Düne.
2 Min. Vom Hotel befindet sich der Food Court, wo es gutes Streetfoodangebot gibt und eine Bar. Die Bierauswahl (gekühlte Krüge!) ist gut.
Das Bett ist gross und sehr komfortabel. Das Zimmer hat eine schalldichte doppelte Tür.
(Superior).
review.comment_negative:
Kommunikation war nicht immer einfach.
Anfangs hatten wir eine Grossfamilie über uns. Man hat das Getrampel mitbekommen. Zum Glück sind sie tagsdrauf abgereist. (= Wohlbefinden ist etwas von den Gästen abgängig, wie so oft in Hotels)

review.rating: Best hotel in Vietnam that I stayed in !
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Best place I stayed in this trip. They also gave me a really beautiful room with sea few both sides . such a friendly staf and so helpful
. the room is really amazing , bed is soft and cozy, all is clean and comfortable. The restaurant is amazing , I actually eat there everyday what I normally not do . all fresh and taste . When I asked for yogurt smoothly without sugar the receptionist bye it for me ( I didn’t know the restaurant normally not have this )So kind . also the offer trips for good price . when I left the nice receptionist made sure the bus stopt at hotel so that I didn’t need to order a taxi . such a good service and when back Vietnam I definitely come back . Also really good place for kids ( lot of things they can play with ) and the beach “ the nice part “ is really close few meters walk .They also have a spa service , that was amazing as well , really friendly lady .

Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Definitely one of the nicest hotels we stayed at in Vietnam. The rooms are decorated nicely which makes them seem bright and welcoming
The bed is very comfortable and the bathroom had a big proper cubicle. The pool is super relaxing and the staff are friendly and helpful - they helped us book a last minute sand dunes sunrise tour, as well as sorting our train ticket to Saigon. There is a food market next door with loads of different vendors offering different cuisines.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to do with the hotel, but it's worth nothing there isn't really a proper beach at this location, the local authority has built a flood defence and the promenade is currently under construction, so you have to walk a bit to use the beach outside some other resorts.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Hạng Bình Dân
review.comment_positive: I loved the unique decor of this hotel which really made me feel at home. Beautiful, spacious and comfortable room that gets cleaned every day. The hotel has a pool and a nice restaurant in African style where you can get lots of different dishes. It’s located in quite a good neighborhood, where I especially enjoyed the Pineapple beach bar, where you can relax, have a beach vibe and swim in the ocean, and the foodcourt across the street where you can get drinks and food from different cuisines. This place attracts a lot of people in the evening, which is very nice because everyone is kind of spread out in Mui Ne. The hotel also helped me book a fun Jeep tour to the fairy stream, fishing village and white and red sand dunes and helped me arrange my bus to Ho Chi Minh.
review.comment_negative: At first, the hotel was a bit difficult to reach when I wanted to check in last minute and early (in the middle of the night). Because it was fully booked, I had to find another place for the night but that was not really their fault.

The hotel helped to organise my onwards transfer. Thank you overall a really great stay!

review.rating: Mình đã có một kỳ nghỉ dễ thương
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Rất thích cách bài trí không gian của La Marina. Thật lãng mạn và dễ thương. Nhà hàng nấu ăn ngon. Các anh chị nhân viên nhiệt tình và đáng mến. Một nơi mà bạn sẽ cảm giác đã có đủ mọi thứ cho một kì nghỉ

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Great value for money, super nice pool with restaurant service at your tanning bed. Lovely room with soft bed, fantastic ocean view. Nice hot shower, nice big safe, good aircon: all great. Location also super nice with a popular food court right down the street.
review.comment_negative: The only thing: a lot of ants in the room.

review.rating: A disappointing stay and we won't return
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The hotel is still exceptionally well decorated with comfy beds and everything working well in the room. The balconies also have stunning views of the ocean and the pool is nice even if a little cold. The daytime staff were very nice.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately due to poor communication and behavior by the owner staff, I think this will be the last time we go back. Firstly the restaurant was closed in the evenings, this was never communicated. One of the reasons we chose to stay here and not a resort is because we have a small baby and knew the restaurant could cater for most of our needs. Not having it in the evening made things more difficult. This was then worse when we asked for food at 3.30PM and they told us they had closed the restaurant (even though it should be open until 5PM).

This we found out was for the owners private party starting way later. This party had extremely loud music which made trying to have a quiet sit on our balcony (one of the things we were most looking forward to) impossible. Then it was difficult to question when the party would end as the night receptionist was having a pool party with his male friends all drinking beer and being threatening when approached. The party would not have been an issue had we been informed. I am disappointed that when tourism needs rebuilding owners decide to behave like this rather than providing communication and the experience that is needed. Another reason to avoid this area.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Aussicht auf das Meer. Das Zimmer war sehr gemütlich eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Das Personal ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel liegt nah am Meer aber in der Nähe gibt es keinen Strand sondern eine Promenade. Dies ist jedoch kein Grund, das Hotel nicht zu buchen.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Billederne er meget retvisende ift. hvad man får. Super flot udsigt, behageligt og rent værelse. God service og de kan hjælpe med at booke udflugter og transport videre. Hotellet har en fantastisk placering lige ved siden af food court og få minutter fra stranden med hyggelige strandbarer og solnedgang. Hotellet ligger sammen med en restaurant, som serverer dejlig mad. Der er rigtig hyggeligt at hænge ud i restauranten og ved poolen, som er forfriskende at tage en dypper i og blive kølet ned i varmen. Helt klart stor værdi for pengene.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Hạng Bình Dân
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Понравилось отношение сотрудников отеля - они все очень дружелюбны и в любом вопросе стараются помочь. Девушки горничные отлично проводят уборку, молодцы. Чистота дорогого отеля. Цена комфортная. Завтраки вкусные. Именно в этом районе это лучшее место для остановки. Шикарный вид на море со своего балкона.
